name: The Adventures of Perseus
description: In this great match-3 game you journey back to the time of the Greek gods and join Perseus on his exciting adventures through the mythical world of ancient Greece.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/ME/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1.0GHz CPU Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.2GHz CPU Graphics: 256 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
